description: Hezbollah confirmed the death of Wissam Tawil, marking a further escalation of tensions with Israel.
maintext: "Hezbollah made a big mistake with us in 2006 and it is also doing so now. It thought that we were like 'spider's cobwebs'. Suddenly, it sees what kind of 'spider'. It sees great force here, the unity of the people, the determination to do everything necessary to restore security to the north," he said.
title: Suspected Israeli strike in Lebanon kills senior Hezbollah commander
